questions.questionText: What is the Navigation Component in Android?
questions.correctAnswer: A framework for handling navigation between destinations, providing a visual editor and back stack management.
questions.explanation: Simplifies navigation logic and handles back/Up button and arguments.

questions.questionText: What is a NavHost in Navigation Component?
questions.correctAnswer: An empty container that displays destinations from the navigation graph.
questions.explanation: NavHost swaps in and out destinations (fragments/views) as users navigate.
